description: As a front-end developer and UI/UX designer, I specialize in optimizing mobile websites, progressive web apps, and native mobile applications. With expertise in JavaScript, I leverage modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and React Native with Expo to deliver ergonomic and high-performance solutions. My main focus is to enhance user experience while addressing technical debt. Experienced in Agile and Scrum environments, I also contribute as a consultant or auditor to develop tailored digital strategies and improve the accessibility and usability of your web and mobile interfaces.

SOCIETE GENERALE, Paris – (January 2021 - May 2022) FRONT UI Integration Team

SGComponent +: The project involved implementing REACT components in a shared library for all Société Générale services

FT-Savings / FT-Credit: Redesign of interfaces and JS refactoring of savings and credit simulation tools interfaces

DQHub / RESG: Evolution and redesign of a ticketing platform managing banking anomalies and incidents for the Société Générale group. Offshore collaboration with Bangalore

Web Performance Optimization: Implementation of best practices to optimize Core Web Vitals (FCP, LCP, CLS, FID) to improve user experience and performance across all applications

Context: ESN Mission

Stack: React, Node, Redux, Typescript, Git, Webpack, Docker, Figma, HTML/ CSS

-------------------

BNP Paribas*, Paris – (* May 2022 - November 2023 ) Artificial Intelligence and Analytics Application Delivery

IMPACT: Development of an ESG assessment questionnaire for credit granting:
Design and development of an ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) assessment questionnaire to enable our company to better evaluate credit-seeking companies. The questionnaire assessed companies' practices in environmental, governance, and social responsibility to promote financing for those that meet these criteria.

Web Performance Optimization: Implementation of best practices to optimize Core Web Vitals (FCP, LCP, CLS, FID) to improve user experience and Impact application performance.

Creation of a questionnaire prototype in Figma to allow the entire team to visualize and adjust various questions and associated user statuses.

QUANTEXA: Maintenance of an application for detecting money laundering activities in client companies

CSR Evolution: Participation in the "CSR Evolution" data visualization project that tracked the evolution of companies' ESG practices over time, using data from various sources.
